    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <identifier>

            <catalog>CUP</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_1d5c3a2cbd88796e656eb8dc7ee6dcf984b1bdaa</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Electromagnetic induction</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Elektromagnetische Induktion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Induction électromagnétique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Indução eletromagnética</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Induzione elettromagnetica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ηλεκτρομαγνητική επαγωγή</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Inducción electromágnetica</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows a set-up for demonstrating the generation of a potential difference in a conducting wire when it is moved up and down in a magnetic field</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electromagnetic induction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnetic field</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">potential difference</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung stellt dar, daß eine Installation
für das Demonstrieren des Erzeugung eines möglichen Unterschiedes 
bezüglich einer Leitleitung, wenn er auf und ab in ein magnetisches 
verschoben wird, auffangen Sie</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre une installation pour 
démontrer la génération d'une différence potentielle dans un fil 
de conduite quand elle est déplacée en haut et en bas un champ 
magnétique</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra uma instalação para 
demonstrar a geração de uma diferença potencial em um fio 
conduzindo quando é movida para cima e para baixo em um campo 
magnético</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra una messa a punto per 
la dimostrazione della generazione di una differenza potenziale in un 
legare di condotta quando è spostata su e giù in un campo magnetico</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει μια οργάνωση για την 
επίδειξη της παραγωγής μιας πιθανής διαφοράς σε ένα καλώδιο 
διεύθυνσης πότε κινείται πάνω-κάτω σε ένα μαγνητικό πεδίο</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra una disposición para 
demostrar la generación de una diferencia potencial en un alambre que
conduce cuando se mueve hacia arriba y hacia abajo en un campo 
magnético</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">elektromagnetische Induktion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">magnetisch fangen Sie auf</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">möglicher Unterschied</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">induction électromagnétique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">champ magnétique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">différence potentielle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">indução eletromagnética</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">campo magnético</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">diferença potencial</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">induzione elettromagnetica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">campo magnetico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">differenza potenziale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ηλεκτρομαγνητική επαγωγή</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μαγνητικό πεδίο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">πιθανή διαφορά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">inducción electromágnetica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">campo magnético</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">diferencia potencial</string>
          </keyword>
